content: The Flint Chief fight takes place on the lava, so you will want to get your hands on the Xiang River Goddess Gourd, which grants you temporary immunity from the lava after you use it. That way, you can fight without worrying about your health constantly depleting.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Chief_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Chief Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Chief Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Flint Chief fight takes place on the lava, so you will want to get your hands on the Xiang River Goddess Gourd, which grants you temporary immunity from the lava after you use it. That way, you can fight without worrying about your health constantly depleting.
